channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
channel.desc: Rancher Erica has spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. But when Aaron arrives, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Under The Lights
channel.desc: Emily reluctantly returns home to her family's rescue ranch to organise the Christmas Carnival to honour her mother, meeting a handsome artist along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Contest
channel.desc: Two exes are thrown together when they both enter a Christmas contest to win money for the charity of their choosing. Could they walk away with more than money.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Twas The Night Before Christmas
channel.desc: Eager to break into directing, former actress Madison takes charge of a town's annual Christmas Eve play.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas On Call
channel.desc: The lives of various first responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sincerely Truly Christmas
channel.desc: When a Christmas wish goes wrong and Christina starts hearing what gifts everyone wants, she learns that getting a one-hit wonder to make music again could make lots of people happy.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Fabled Holiday
channel.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend Anderson unexpectedly reunite in a familiar looking town full of Christmas spirit.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sealed With A List
channel.desc: This holiday season, Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Finnish Line
channel.desc: Inspired by her father's legacy, Anya enters Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival and her own anxieties.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas By Candlelight
channel.desc: Wellness expert Juliet enlists candle store owner Tom's help making Christmas memory candles. Will their differing views lead to success or disaster.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas For The Ages
channel.desc: Prompted by their youngest granddaughter, four generations of women celebrate Christmas and family in the style of the 40s, 60s, 90s and today.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Angel (M24)
channel.desc: A young girl feels dejected as she tries in vain to secure a job. However, things change at Christmas time. Stars KC Clyde.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Making Spirits Bright
channel.desc: Two feuding families must find a way to get everyone to work together in order to win a town competition that could save their both their livelihoods. Romantic drama.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Tale Of Two Christmases
channel.desc: Emma experiences two different Christmases: one where she stays in town and celebrates with a new crush, and one where she returns home to her family. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Mistletoe Secret
channel.desc: Seasonal romance following a ghost writer who arrives in a small town before Christmas and falls for the local Mistletoe Diner's owner.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Deck The Walls
channel.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Boyfriends of Christmas Past
channel.desc: As Christmas approaches, Lauren is visited by the ghosts of four ex-boyfriends. She must learn to open her heart or risk losing her best friend, Nate.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Holiday Crashers
channel.desc: During the holiday season, Toni and Bri decide to shake up their mundane world by creating new identities to crash the Christmas parties from the shop's confidential invitations.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Ghosts Of Christmas Always
channel.desc: Katherine is a Ghost of Christmas Present and she must help one soul, Peter, rediscover his Christmas spirit. But this year has something unusual in store.
